posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
The biggest reason to take WM in a build is to get a wider critical threat range, which you get at the 7th WM level. You are stopping 1 level short of the big payoff for all those prerequisites you took to get WM.
If you take 6 levels of Fighter instead, you would get 5 feats: Epic Weapon Focus, Armor Skin, Epic Prowess, Weapon Spec, and Epic Weapon Spec. This would allow you to use all 4 general epic feats for Great DEX. You could also replace some of those WM prerequisites with more useful feats.

Another idea would be to take an additional 6 levels of AA.

Or, drop a Ranger level to get that 7th WM level. Maybe choose shortsword instead of rapier, so you can take advantage of the Ranger's dual-wield ability.
